game.name: The Unplace
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: “The Unplace: Escaping The Cursed Place by Facing Different Trials” is a first-person game where you must escape a cursed place by completing a series of trials.
game.shortDescriptionEn: “The Unplace: Escaping The Cursed Place by Facing Different Trials” is a first-person game where you must escape a cursed place by completing a series of trials.
